name: D.rogue #7DRL 2020
description:
A roguelike made for 7DRL by @1peck_csgo.
You can save your progress (scroll item from drop) but save will be deleted after you die.

Use Enter to get into fullscreen, Escape to exit the game.

have fun.

arrow key to move
space: inventory
x: use button
c: remove item from inventory
